sentences.sContent: Occasionally his behaviour became so uncontrollable that he had to be placed in a straitjacket.
sentences.sCn: 有时他的行为会如此失控，以至他不得不被穿上一件约束衣。

trans.tranCn: （尤指束缚精神病患者手臂用的）约束衣
trans.tranOther: A straitjacket is a special jacket used to tie the arms of a violent person tightly around their body
